sense.gloss: to run (of a vehicle), to drive, to travel, to move, to sail
to rush (to), to dash, to race
to retreat, to flee, to defect (to)
to run away, to abscond, to elope
to flash (of lightning), to streak, to shoot (through; e.g. of pain), to run (through), to flare, to flit (e.g. across one's face), to spread quickly (of news, shock, etc.)
to go (e.g. bad, to extremes), to become, to turn, to take to (e.g. crime), to get carried away by (e.g. one's emotions), to get involved in, to get wrapped up in
to run (through; of a road, street, etc.), to extend (e.g. of a mountain range), to stretch, to lie
running (of a car, bus, etc.), traveling, travelling
acting rashly, running wildly, behaving recklessly, reckless driving, rampage
treat (esp. food and drink), entertainment, treating someone (to a meal), taking someone to dinner
gorgeous dinner, feast, excellent food, special dish, delicacy
gliding, sliding, skating (on ice), skiing, glide, slide

sdata.j: またいつか↑風↑↓かぜ↓のように↑走↑↓はし↓るんだ。
sdata.e: Someday I'll run like the wind.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑赤信号↑↓あかしんごう↓を↑無視↑↓むし↓して↑走↑↓はし↓りましたね。
↑極端↑↓きょくたん↓に↑走↑↓はし↓ってはならない。
↑極端↑↓きょくたん↓に↑走↑↓はし↓ってはいけない。↑適度↑↓てきど↓であることは↑何事↑↓なにごと↓においても↑大切↑↓たいせつ↓である。
sdata.e: Don't go to extremes. To be moderate is important in anything.

sdata.j: ↑教室↑↓きょうしつ↓に↑向↑↓む↓かって↑子供↑↓こども↓たちは↑走↑↓はし↓っていった。
sdata.e: The children ran toward the classroom.

sdata.j: ↑競走↑↓きょうそう↓↑馬↑↓ば↓は↑互角↑↓ごかく↓でトラックをまわった。
sdata.e: The horses are coming down the track and it's neck and neck.

sdata.j: ↑急↑↓きゅう↓↑行列↑↓ぎょうれつ↓↑車↑↓しゃ↓が↑目↑↓め↓にとまらぬ↑速↑↓はや↓さで↑走↑↓はし↓りすぎていった。
sdata.e: The express train went by so fast that we hardly saw it.

sdata.j: ↑急↑↓いそ↓いで↑走↑↓はし↓れば、↑列車↑↓れっしゃ↓に↑間↑↓ま↓に↑合↑↓あ↓いますよ。
sdata.e: If you run fast, you can catch the train.

sdata.j: ↑汽船↑↓きせん↓と↑汽車↑↓きしゃ↓ではどちらが↑速↑↓はや↓く↑走↑↓はし↓りますか。
sdata.e: Which goes faster, a ship or a train?

sdata.j: ↑機関車↑↓きかんしゃ↓は↑長↑↓なが↓い↑貨物↑↓かもつ↓↑車↑↓しゃ↓の↑列↑↓れつ↓を↑引↑↓ひ↓っ↑張↑↓ぱ↓って↑走↑↓はし↓っていた。
sdata.e: The locomotive was pulling a long line of freight cars.
